General.Name: Metalex Ventures Ltd.
General.Description: Metalex Ventures Ltd., an exploration stage company, engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties primarily in Canada. The company primarily explores for kimberlite hosted diamond deposits. It holds 100% interest in certain mineral claims located in the Kyle Lake area of Ontario; and 77.75% contributing interest in various mineral claims located in the Wemindji James Bay region of Quebec. The company also holds 60% contributing interest in claim area covering 4,021 square kilometers of Archaean Cratonic and Proterozoic rocks located in Morocco. Metalex Ventures Ltd. is headquartered in Kelowna, Canada.
General.Address: 203-1634 Harvey Avenue, Kelowna, BC, Canada, V1Y 6G2
